continueLogin.title: Sign In
continueLogin.message: Check and approve on your existing Criptext device to continue

deviceNotApproved.title: Sign In Rejected
deviceNotApproved.message: Your request to access this account was rejected by a verified device.

warning.text: Multiple rejections could lead your device to be blacklisted from Criptext.

usePassword.title: Warning
usePassword.prefix: If you sign in using your password your
usePassword.strong: mailbox history from other devices won't be available
usePassword.suffix: on this device. Would you like to continue?

loginNewAccount.title: Sign In Warning
loginNewAccount.prefix: Sign in with another account will delete all mail saved on this device of the accounts

signin.title: Warning!
signin.prefix: You did not set a Recovery Email, so

forgotPasswordMessage.title: Reset Password
forgotPasswordMessage.prefix: A reset link was sent to
forgotPasswordMessage.suffix: The link will be valid for 30 minutes

notSetError.title: No Recovery Email
notSetError.message: Password recovery is impossible as no recovery email was set on your account. For further assistance contact us:

fallbackError.title: Reset Password
fallbackError.message: Failed to send the Reset password link. Try again

errorMessages.USERNAME_INVALID: At least 3 characters. Must begin with letters A-Z.

checkbox.prefix: I have read and agree with the

confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.title: Well, that's odd...
confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.message: Something has happened that is delaying this process.
confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.detail: Do you want to continue waiting?

loginFailed.name: Login error
loginFailed.description:
An error occurred while login. Please try again.
Code:

tooManyDevices.name: Too many devices
tooManyDevices.description:
You already have too many active devices. 
From one of your trusted devices remove some inactive device and try again. If you can't access any of your trusted devices, contact support

tooManyRequests.name: Too many requests
tooManyRequests.description:
Too many consecutive attempts.
Please try again in

wrongCredentials.name: Wrong credentials
wrongCredentials.description: Incorrect username or password. Check credentials and try again.
